channel.title: Realm of perils [317] Fresh server!
channel.description:
Webclient : http://realmofperils.net/play/
Website link : http://realmofperils.net/forum/
10+ Players online each day and just started!
WORKING JAD! [[IMG]http://realmofperils.net/images/3.jpg[/img][IMG]http://realmofperils.net/images/4.jpg[/img] Dueling Arena with working stakes![IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/nv3bbm.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://realmofperils.net/images/5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://realmofperils.net/images/1.jpg[/img][IMG]http://realmofperils.net/images/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://realmofperils.net/images/6.jpg[/img]
Features:
Advanced Membership system allowing you to upgrade for better features Highscores to show off your great pking skills Easy Item searching, allowing you to spawn all the items you need! Great Switching allowing you to be the best hybridder you can!
Fun Pk, Multi Pk, Mage Bank, 44 Portals, Varrock Pk, Edgeville, Wilderness Agility! Shop Dungeoneering Summoning 70% of summoning specs work Overloads Most 634 Items have been added Hit effects such as Divine reducing Damage Rewards for fight pits enhance exp Good eco 14+ Boss's TriviaBot to make server much fun Clipped npcs and players BoB summoning Duel arena Much more join now!
SOME MORE FEATURES: Minigames Warriors Guild Minigame Barrows Pest Control Tzhaar Fight Pits Duel Arena *Comming Soon* Castle Wars - Clan up with friends & War - Suggest more on forums we make what people like.
God Wars Dungeoun! MAP! Npc Clip - Player followin in progress :) King Black Dragon 474 Npc Dagannoth Kings Chaos Elemental Fight Pits Obelisks teleport in wilderness Split Private Chat Perfect teleporting gfx timers. Enchanted bolts special attacks. Accurate Combat lvl formula 474 Prayer Interface(100% working server-side) Gameframe Changer (459 474 484 508 525) Hp + Prayer Orbs filling and blinking New 474/508 Maps and Objects A lot of updated npcs, items and emotes No Roll Backs Perfect Gs stances + Spec just like Runescape New Lunar Interface Amazing hybriding Perfect Combat NO GLitches Autocasting (Ancient staff, fire staff etc.) Barrows (Spade digging + Chest Loot + Barrows KC) Pest Control Clan Chat 100% Working chat with all your friends. Skills Trainable Slayer with Tasks "abyssal demon drop dbow + Whip"
